mapper.select: SELECT qrtz_job_details.JOB_NAME, qrtz_job_details.JOB_GROUP, qrtz_job_details.JOB_CLASS_NAME, qrtz_triggers.TRIGGER_NAME, qrtz_triggers.TRIGGER_STATE, qrtz_triggers.TRIGGER_GROUP, qrtz_cron_triggers.CRON_EXPRESSION, qrtz_cron_triggers.TIME_ZONE_ID FROM qrtz_job_details left JOIN qrtz_triggers ON qrtz_triggers.JOB_GROUP = qrtz_job_details.JOB_GROUP left JOIN qrtz_cron_triggers ON qrtz_cron_triggers.TRIGGER_GROUP = qrtz_triggers.TRIGGER_GROUP

SELECT qrtz_job_details.JOB_NAME, qrtz_job_details.JOB_GROUP, qrtz_job_details.JOB_CLASS_NAME, qrtz_triggers.TRIGGER_NAME, qrtz_triggers.TRIGGER_STATE, qrtz_triggers.TRIGGER_GROUP, qrtz_cron_triggers.CRON_EXPRESSION, qrtz_cron_triggers.TIME_ZONE_ID FROM qrtz_job_details left JOIN qrtz_triggers ON qrtz_triggers.JOB_GROUP = qrtz_job_details.JOB_GROUP left JOIN qrtz_cron_triggers ON qrtz_cron_triggers.TRIGGER_GROUP = qrtz_triggers.TRIGGER_GROUP WHERE qrtz_job_details.JOB_NAME = #{jobClassName} AND qrtz_job_details.JOB_GROUP = #{jobGroupName}
